channel.title: Charles Kelly's Learn a Song
channel.description: These are English songs that a large number of native English speakers know and are part of our culture. I'm doing this podcast primarily for people who are studying English as a second language (ESL / EFL). However, native English speakers, both adults and children, might find these interesting.

item.title: Twinkle, Twinkle Little Star (with Pronunciation Practice)
item.description: Visit http://www.manythings.org/songs/twinkle/ to see the lyrics.
item.itunes:author: www.manythings.org/songs
